title: Chicken & Rice Soup

rice: 3/4 cup white long-grain rice, uncooked (or 2 1/4 cups cooked rice)

instructions: Melt butter in large soup pot over medium heat.
Add onions, carrots, celery. Soften for 4 min, then add garlic and cook for 1 min more.
Add seasonings, soy sauce, hot sauce, chicken, broth.
Bring soup to gentle boil and cover partially. Allow chicken to cook slowly - about 15-20 min.
Remove chicken and shred. Return it to the soup.

While the chicken simmers, cook rice separately. Bring broth (1 1/2 cups) to boil in saucepan. Add rice, bring to boil. Cover tightly and reduce to simmer, cook 15 mins. Turn off heat and let sit covered for 10 min.
